column1: '''''Amon Hen'' 251''' is the two-hundred-and-fifty-first issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)
* A poem in honour of [[Christopher Tolkien]]'s 90th Birthday
* Report: King Edward's School and the Great War exhibition
* [[Gandalf]] and the Merlin of the Arthurian Romances
